ComicInfo.Title: The Ray That Turned Steel to Dust; In the Days of the Cavemen; The Queen of Soulless Isle; Assignment In Greenland; The Hand of the Fire-God; Captured On Cato; Suicide Attempt #2; The Skullface Kurd Mob; The Last of the Ray-Men
ComicInfo.Summary:
1.The Ray That Turned Steel To Dust Featuring Samson
2. In the Days of the Cavemen Featuring Flip Falcon
Also featuring a chameo of dinosaurs and a giant vulture!
3. The Queen of Soulless Isle Featuring Golden Knight
Coincidentally, features a giant vulture!
4. Assignment In Greenland Featuring Yank Wilson
5. The Revenge of the Slaves
6. The Hand of the Fire-God Featuring Captain Kidd
7. Captured On Cato Featuring Space Smith (by someone who isn`t Fletcher Hanks)
8. Suicide Attempt #2 Featuring Professor Fiend
9. The Skullface Kurd Mob Featuring Stardust the Super Wizard (by Fletcher Hanks)
10. The Last of the Ray-Men Featuring Sub Saunders
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 18:10:30. [Issue ID 1050]
